metadata.title: CVE-2022-29339 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: In GPAC 2.1-DEV-rev87-g053aae8-master, function BS_ReadByte() in utils/bitstream.c has a failed assertion, which causes a Denial of Service. This vulnerability was fixed in commit 9ea93a2.

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
